channel.title: Custom clan wars
channel.description: i made my own custom clan wars u have to type ::clanwars then u go to this place and u select which team your on, once you have selected your team you get teleported to the arena but theres a barricade inbetween the 2 teams. the problem im havign is when i type :: startwar it deletes all the barricades in the way, wel it does for me nobody else can see it...

item.title: Custom clan wars
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

because it’s not global…im guessing you added the command in client.java? Yeah, well client only deals with 1 player. Like um…each player has their own client.java
example:

player A logs on and is assigned client.java 1
player B logs out and is assigned client.java 2

else all the booleans and ints and shit wouldnt work because if player A did something to change a boolean it would change for player B too…
add it in playerhandler and have the command reference a void in it…like in the client ud have

if (command.startsWith("stuff")) {
server.PlayerHandler.voidName();
}

stuff/voidName would be changed, then in the playerhandler void make sure it’s public static…and put what u currently have to delete now…

Read full topic
